attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the ever increasing petrol prices please sign this to show that we want out of this goverment if they keep increasing the prices. the petrol stations do not listen they keep increasing the prices before any budget then on top of that we have the chancellor increasing at the budget. How can we get out of this recession if they keep increasing prices

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
